dmca.title: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity - MS Ref. 47853
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: MSAntiPiracy02 [mailto:Internet2@microsoft-antipiracy.com] 
Posted At: Friday, August 11, 2006 11:19 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
Activity - MS Ref. 47853
Subject: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity
- MS Ref. 47853


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA256

VIA EMAIL: 

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity 

URL: http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=3&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=6&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=12&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=16&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=17&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=13&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=5&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/archive/index.php/t-77640.html
CASE #: 47853 

11 August 2006 

Dear Sir or Madam, 

Microsoft has received information that the domain listed above, which
appears to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed
copies of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to
copyrighted works published by Microsoft.

1. Identification of copyrighted works: 

Copyrighted work(s): 
Office 12 Beta
Encarta 2006 Premium
Encarta 2007 Premium
Microsoft Student 2006 Graphing Calculator Plus! XP Plus! Digital Media
Edition 

Copyright owner: 
Microsoft Corporation 

2. Copyright infringing material or activity found at the following
location(s):
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=3&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=6&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=12&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=16&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=17&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=13&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=77640&page=5&pp=15
http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/archive/index.php/t-77640.html

The above computer program(s) is being made available for copying,
through downloading, at the above location without authorization of the
copyright owner.

3. Statement of authority: 

The information in this notice is accurate, and I hereby certify under
penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Microsoft,
the owner of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above.  I have a
good faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above
have been authorized by Microsoft, its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you
take expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material
described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and
distribution of this software via your company's network. 

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us
regarding what actions you take. 

Yours sincerely, 

James Young
Internet Investigator 

on behalf of Microsoft Corporation
One Microsoft Way
Redmond, WA 98052
United States of America 

E-mail: Internet1@microsoft-antipiracy.com
